articles.title: 2023 Oscars Best International Feature Predictions
articles.description: 2023 Oscars best international feature predictions include "Close," "Bardo," "Corsage," "Holy Spider," "Decision to Leave," "Argentina, 1985" and "EO."

articles.title: Veteran Steyn starts at flyhalf for Springboks vs. Argentina
articles.description: DURBAN, South Africa (AP) — South Africa was forced to select 35-year-old veteran Frans Steyn at flyhalf on Tuesday for the decisive final game of the...
articles.content:
DURBAN, South Africa (AP) — South Africa was forced to select 35-year-old veteran Frans Steyn at flyhalf on Tuesday for the decisive final game of the Rugby Championship against Argentina.

articles.title: In land of Maradona and Messi, fans jostle for World Cup stickers
articles.description: In convenience stores around Argentina, kids - and their parents - are caught up in a new craze: the hunt for soccer World Cup stickers that have driven the already sport-mad country into a frenzy and left many shops with no stock left to sell.
articles.content: BUENOS AIRES, Sept 20 (Reuters) - In convenience stores around Argentina, kids - and their parents - are caught up in a new craze: the hunt for soccer World Cup stickers that have driven the already sport-mad country into a frenzy and left many shops... [1894 chars]

articles.title: Analysis: In Latin America, democracies shaken ahead of key elections
articles.description: An assassination attempt in Argentina and spurts of election-linked violence in Brazil have emerged as the latest signs of growing political discontent in Latin America, creating a treacherous environment for incumbents of all stripes.

articles.title: Rugby-Explainer: The Rugby Championship log positions
articles.description: The second differentiator is the number of wins between the sides in question, but again this is unlikely to provide any assistance. New Zealand and South Africa each won a test against one another, and if Australia and Argentina rise to the challenge this weekend, that will be the same all round.
articles.content:
It is conceivable, however unlikely, that all four teams in the Rugby Championship could finish on 14 points following this weekend's final round of fixtures in the closely-fought battle for supremacy in the southern hemisphere.
